title: Bug 18915[Preferences] switching between erroneous preferences pages should generate error, not warning.
OB: When entering invalid data on any preference page, a warning dialog is displayed when attempting to switch to another page without fixing the problem. The warning dialog states: 'The currently displayed page contains invalid values'
EB: The user should receive an error dialog instead of a warning dialog when trying to switch to another page with invalid values on the current page. The error dialog should indicate that the user is not allowed to leave the page without fixing the mistake.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open any preference page.
2. Enter invalid data that triggers the red flag notification on the UI.
3. Attempt to select another preference page without fixing the problem.
